tool_description: Simulates the financial impact of proposed pricing strategies using historical data and market models to predict revenue, margin, and volume changes.

baseline_prices.description: Current prices for products being analyzed

proposed_prices.description: Proposed new prices for the same products

simulation_period_days.description: Number of days to simulate impact over

error_messages: Array length mismatch: baseline_prices and proposed_prices must have the same length.
Invalid price values: All prices must be positive numbers.
Invalid simulation period: simulation_period_days must be between 1 and 365.
Invalid elasticity: market_elasticity must be a negative number between -5 and -0.1.
Insufficient historical data: Not enough data to run accurate simulations.
usage: Provide baseline_prices and proposed_prices arrays of equal length. Optionally adjust simulation_period_days and market_elasticity. Returns detailed impact projections.

margin_impact.description: Projected change in profit margin percentage

break_even_timeframe.description: Days to break even on revenue impact
